title: Can someone explain to me the knockout stage draw?
body:
Ok, so the rules are:
1. No two teams from the same group can be placed on the same half of the bracket 
2. Each Quarterfinal will feature one No. 1 seed and one No. 2 seed from Groups.

So, OG got drawn into FNC group, but got bumped into the group with FW. This is weird, because they were not part of the same group. Furthermore, you can't say that the region needs to be different because clearly from the KT Rolster v Koo tigers, both korean teams. 

So can anyone explain this to me? I got real confused.

replies.body: Ah, makes so much more sense now. Thanks guys!

It's all about where you were in the group stage. 

If you were in the same group, for instance like KT Rolster (1st group D) and Origen (2nd Group D) then you can't be in the same half of the finals bracket.

So KT Rolster were drawn first for the finals and put in the top half of the bracket.

This means that Origen, who were in Group D with KT, can't be in the same half of the bracket in the finals.

So when Origen was drawn into a match against Fnatic that put them in KT's half, they were then pushed to the other side of the bracket and slotted vs Flash Wolves.

two teams from the same group cant be on the same side of the draw (to ensure they cant meet again in the semi finals), and since KT was already on the same side of the draw as fnatic, origen had to be placed on the other side
